title: ReactJS Developer - Remote
description:
Role Overview:

We are seeking a UI ReactJS development engineer to join the McAfee Consumer Platform Product Development team. In this role, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining the various projects handled by our development team. The ideal candidate should thrive in a dynamic, fast-paced environment and possess the ability to deliver solutions to meet the development requirements of multiple projects.

This is a remote position in India. We will only consider candidates currently in India and are not offering relocation assistance at this time.

About the role:


Work collaboratively with product managers, architects, and colleagues to design cloud solutions that are scalable, performant, and cost optimized.
Perform Failure Mode and Effects Analysis (FMEA), implement preventive measures against potential failures, and establish monitoring and alerting systems.
Evaluate technical feasibility through the creation of rapid proofs of concepts (PoCs) and experimentation with new and relevant technologies and tools.
Actively participate in an Agile Scrum environment, contributing to the development of e-commerce applications and services.
Adapt to the sprint requirements by being proficient in various roles, including design, development, testing, and deployment.


About You:


4 to 5 years of extensive experience in designing and developing UI solutions.
Proficient in UI development using React.JS, JavaScript, ES6, TypeScript, HTML5, CSS3, and other design frameworks.
Good to have knowledge of EKS, Dockers, Kubernetes, containers, etc.
You should have a knack for software monitoring tools like Grafana, Instana, etc.
Proven track record of developing, deploying, debugging, and scaling applications utilizing Amazon Web Services (AWS).
Good to have knowledge of the Node.JS framework.
